name: Virtual Happy Family 2018
description:
Winter Adventures with Virtual Family quite Amazing!!

Another master piece for Virtual Mom & Virtual DAD fanatics now in form of Virtual Family. During the winter vacation, great thing is that we get to spend time with family. Different household activities we have to done with family. We use to enjoy the winter seasons by playing in the snow, making snowman & making snow angles. Making soup, fixing leakage, repairing pipe, snowball fight & many more engaging activities are waiting in this winter season for you by Happy Family Game.

Be a part of this Virtual family and make your winters more memorable & fun. 3D Models, Perfect Control, Mad activities, coolest graphics, realistic arts, awesome soundtrack are going to lead you on a new journey of excitement. There is many different random events to respond to, all of them adding surprise to this simulation game. This is task based game with completion of every level variety of tasks increases.

Make your winters a memorial story.

Happy Family 2018 Features:
• Realistic 3D environment & graphics
• Different fun packed household activities missions
• Smooth background music
• Engaging game play
• Easy & fun to play
• Family Life simulation game
• Super Cool House Environment
